properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM SUBSCRIPTION

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNUM", A.* FROM( SELECT S.SUB_NO, S.ANIMAL_ID, M.MEMBER_ID, S.NAME, S.TEL_NUM, S.SUB_DATE, S.SUB_READ
FROM SUBSCRIPTION S JOIN MEMBER M ON (S.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY S.SUB_NO ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS "RNUM", A.* FROM( SELECT S.SUB_NO, S.ANIMAL_ID, M.MEMBER_ID, S.NAME, S.TEL_NUM, S.SUB_DATE, S.SUB_READ
FROM SUBSCRIPTION S JOIN MEMBER M ON (S.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE SHELTER_NO = ? ORDER BY S.SUB_NO ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM SUBSCRIPTION WHERE SHELTER_NO = ?
SELECT * FROM SUBSCRIPTION SB WHERE SB.SUB_NO = ?
